required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Telmisartan Between Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg (T80/A5/H12.5 mg) Fixed-dose Combination (FDC) Tablet and T80/H12.5 mg Tab and A5 mg (Encap A2.5 mg Tab x2) Concomitant Use
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence of Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet Compared to Concomitant Administration of Telmisartan 80 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet and Amlodipine 5 mg Capsule in Healthy Male Subjects (an Open-label, Randomised, Single-dose, Two-sequence, Four-period Replicated Crossover Study), With Influence of Food on the Bioavailability of Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Fixed-dose Combination Tablet

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the steady state pharmacokinetics of different formulation of Telmisartan, Amlodipine, and Hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ).

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma After Single Administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Tablet
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma after single oral administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve (AUC 0-tz) of the Analytes in Plasma Over the Time Interval From 0 to the Last Quantifiable Plasma Concentration
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-tz) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable plasma concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve (AUC 0-tz) of the Analytes in Plasma Over the Time Interval From 0 to the Last Quantifiable Plasma Concentration After Single Administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Tablet
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-tz) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable plasma concentration after single administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve (AUC 0-infinity) of the Analytes in Plasma Over the Time Interval From 0 to Extrapolated Infinity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-infinity) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma over the time interval from 0 to extrapolated infinity

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve (AUC 0-infinity) of the Analytes in Plasma Over the Time Interval From 0 to Extrapolated Infinity After Single Administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Tablet
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC 0-infinity) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma over the time interval from 0 to extrapolated infinity after single administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet

arm_group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet
Telmisartan 80 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet and Amlodipine 5 mg capsule

intervention.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg FDC tablet

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy male subjects age >=20 and <=35 years; body weight: >=50 kg and <=80 kg; body mass index: >=18.0 and <=25.0 kg/m2
- Without any clinically significant findings and complications on the basis of a complete medical history, including the physical examination, vital signs (blood pressure (BP), pulse rate (PR), body temperature)
- Signed and dated written informed consent prior to admission to the trial in accordance with the Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and the local legislation
Exclusion criteria:
- Any finding of the medical examination (including BP, PR and ECGs) deviating from normal and of clinical relevance

group.title: Sequence TRRTT
group.description: Subjects were treated with telmisartan 80 mg (T80), amlodipine 5 mg (A5) and hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) 12.5 mg (H12.5 mg) in the following order from period 1 to period 5: T (test product: T80/A5/H12.5 mg fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet) - R (reference products: T80/H12.5 mg FDC tablet and A5 mg capsule) - R - T - T. Treatment periods 1 to 4 were administered following an overnight fast of at least 10 hours, in treatment period 5 after an overnight fast of at least 10 hours, a Japanese-style breakfast was served 30 minutes before drug administration

group.title: Sequence RTTR
group.description: Subjects were treated telmisartan 80 mg (T80), amlodipine 5 mg (A5) and hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) 12.5 mg (H12.5 mg) in the following order from period 1 to period 4: R - T - T - R. The treatments were administered following an overnight fast of at least 10 hours.

participants_list.participants: Withdrawal by one subject in washout period
This sequence consists of only 4 periods.

baseline.population: Treated Set (TS): This subject set included all subjects who were dispensed the study drug and were documented to have taken at least one dose of the study drug.

group.title: Sequence TRRTT
group.description: Subjects were treated with telmisartan 80 mg (T80), amlodipine 5 mg (A5) and hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) 12.5 mg (H12.5 mg) in the following order from period 1 to period 5: T (test product: T80/A5/H12.5 mg fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet) - R (reference products: T80/H12.5 mg FDC tablet and A5 mg capsule) - R - T - T. Treatment periods 1 to 4 were administered following an overnight fast of at least 10 hours, in treatment period 5 after an overnight fast of at least 10 hours, a Japanese-style breakfast was served 30 minutes before drug administration

group.title: Sequence RTTR
group.description: Subjects were treated telmisartan 80 mg (T80), amlodipine 5 mg (A5) and hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) 12.5 mg (H12.5 mg) in the following order from period 1 to period 4: R - T - T - R. The treatments were administered following an overnight fast of at least 10 hours.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma
outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS) which included all healthy subjects in the TS who had evaluable PK variables for both treatments (i.e. had data of at least one analyte for both test and reference products) in periods 1, 2, 3 and 4. Subjects who had an important protocol violation relevant to PK evaluation were to be excluded from the PKS.

group.title: T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC
group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet

group.title: T80/H12.5 FDC + A5 Capsule
group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet and Amlodipine 5 mg capsule

measure.title: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma
measure.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS) which included all healthy subjects in the TS who had evaluable PK variables for both treatments (i.e. had data of at least one analyte for both test and reference products) in periods 1, 2, 3 and 4. Subjects who had an important protocol violation relevant to PK evaluation were to be excluded from the PKS.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment means on the log−transformed scale for telmisartan 80 mg
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Bioequivalence was established by using the average bioequivalence method and by ensuring that the ratio of Cmax of the two treatments was within the pre-specified acceptance range (80%-125%)
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC divided by T80/H12.5 FDC + A5 mono.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment means on the log−transformed scale for amlodipine 5 mg
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Bioequivalence was established by using the average bioequivalence method and by ensuring that the ratio of Cmax of the two treatments was within the pre-specified acceptance range (80%-125%)
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC divided by T80/H12.5 FDC + A5 mono.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment means on the log−transformed scale for hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Bioequivalence was established by using the average bioequivalence method and by ensuring that the ratio of Cmax of the two treatments was within the pre-specified acceptance range (80%-125%)
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC divided by T80/H12.5 FDC + A5 mono.

outcome.title: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma After Single Administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Tablet
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma after single oral administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet
outcome.time_frame: 3 hours (h) pre drug admin and 1h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 32h, 48h after drug admin, in addition 15min, 30min, 45min, 1h 30min, 2h 30min for telmisartan and HCTZ only, 72h for telmisartan and amlodipine only and 96h, 120h, 144h for amlodipine only
outcome.population: Food effect analysis set (FEAS) which included healthy subjects of treatment sequence TRRTT in the TS who were judged appropriate to continue to period 5 by the investigator, had evaluable PK variables for both feeding conditions and did not have an important protocol violation relevant to relative bioavailability evaluation.

group.title: T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fed
group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet in fed condition

group.title: T80/A5/H12.5 FDC Fasted
group.description: Telmisartan 80 mg/Amlodipine 5 mg/Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg fixed dose combination tablet in fasted condition

measure.title: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax) of the Analytes in Plasma After Single Administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Tablet
measure.description: Maximum measured concentration (Cmax) of telmisartan, amlodipine and HCTZ in plasma after single oral administration of T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC tablet
measure.population: Food effect analysis set (FEAS) which included healthy subjects of treatment sequence TRRTT in the TS who were judged appropriate to continue to period 5 by the investigator, had evaluable PK variables for both feeding conditions and did not have an important protocol violation relevant to relative bioavailability evaluation.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment geometric means for telmisartan 80 mg. No hypothesis was tested.
analysis.method_desc: Model included “subject” as random effect and “feeding condition” as fixed effect.
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fed divided by T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fasted.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment geometric means for amlodipine 5 mg. No hypothesis was tested.
analysis.method_desc: Model included “subject” as random effect and “feeding condition” as fixed effect.
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fed divided by T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fasted.

analysis.groups_desc: Adjusted by−treatment geometric means for hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg. No hypothesis was tested.
analysis.method_desc: Model included “subject” as random effect and “feeding condition” as fixed effect.
analysis.estimate_desc: Ratio calculated as T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fed divided by T80/A5/H12.5 mg FDC Fasted.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Boehringer Ingelheim (BI) acknowledges that investigators have the right to publish the study results. Investigators shall provide BI with a copy of any publication or presentation for review prior to any submission. Such review will be done with regard to proprietary information, information related to patentable inventions, medical, scientific, and statistical accuracy within 60 days. BI may request a delay of the publication in order to protect BI’s intellectual property rights.
